about.title: Hello! I'm Vincent Yeboah (Believer)
about.description1: I'm a dedicated student currently pursuing General Arts at Toase Senior High School. Originally from Manso Nkwanta, I now reside in Ohwim, where I balance my academic pursuits with my passion for technology.
about.description2: My journey in education has led me to develop a strong interest in Elective Mathematics and Information Communication Technology (ICT). I believe in the power of education to transform lives and create opportunities for growth and development.

projects.title: Personal Portfolio Website
projects.description: A responsive and interactive portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and achievements. Built with modern web technologies and featuring dark mode, smooth animations, and contact form functionality.

projects.title: Advanced Math Calculator
projects.description: A comprehensive calculator application that solves complex mathematical problems including algebra, geometry, and calculus. Features a user-friendly interface with step-by-step solutions.

projects.title: School Management System
projects.description: A web-based application designed to help schools manage student records, attendance, and academic performance. Includes features for teachers, students, and administrators.

projects.title: Cybersecurity Awareness Platform
projects.description: An educational platform that teaches basic cybersecurity concepts and ethical hacking principles. Includes interactive tutorials and simulated security scenarios for learning purposes.

projects.title: Mobile Math Learning App
projects.description: A mobile application that helps students learn mathematics through interactive exercises, video tutorials, and personalized learning paths. Designed specifically for high school curriculum.

projects.title: Community Information Portal
projects.description: A web portal that provides information and resources for my local community. Features news updates, event calendars, and educational resources to help community members stay informed.

education.title: Academic Journey
education.description1: I'm currently a student at Toase Senior High School, where I'm studying General Arts. This program has allowed me to explore a diverse range of subjects while focusing on my areas of strength and interest.
education.description2: My academic path is carefully designed to build a strong foundation for my future career in technology, combining analytical thinking from mathematics with practical skills from ICT.

specializations.title: Elective Mathematics
specializations.description: I have a strong aptitude for mathematical concepts, problem-solving, and analytical thinking. This subject helps me develop logical reasoning skills that are essential for technology fields.

specializations.title: Elective ICT
specializations.description: My passion for technology finds its expression in ICT studies. I'm learning about computer systems, programming fundamentals, and digital literacy that form the foundation for my future career.

certificates.title: BECE Certificate
certificates.description: Basic Education Certificate Examination - The foundation of my secondary education journey.

certificates.title: Academic Awards
certificates.description: Recognition for outstanding performance in Mathematics and ICT subjects.

certificates.title: Extracurricular
certificates.description: Certificates from various school activities, competitions, and leadership roles.

interests.title: Ethical Hacking
interests.description: I'm fascinated by cybersecurity and ethical hacking. Understanding how to protect digital systems and identify vulnerabilities interests me greatly as I prepare for a career in technology.

interests.title: Web Design
interests.description: Creating beautiful, functional websites is both an art and a science. I enjoy learning about user experience, responsive design, and the latest web technologies.

interests.title: Programming
interests.description: Beyond web design, I'm interested in software development and learning programming languages that will help me build innovative solutions to real-world problems.

footer.about: General Arts student at Toase Senior High School with a passion for technology, mathematics, and creating digital solutions for the future.
